definition: The word "heilig" refers to something that is considered sacred, divine, or holy. It is commonly used to describe religious or spiritual concepts, objects, places, or rituals. It can also be used metaphorically to emphasize the importance or sanctity of something non-religious.

examples.german: Die heilige Messe beginnt um 10 Uhr.
examples.english: The holy mass starts at 10 o'clock.

examples.german: Der Papst ist das Oberhaupt der katholischen Kirche.
examples.english: The Pope is the head of the Catholic Church.

examples.german: Die Reliquie wird als heilig betrachtet.
Die Pilger besuchen den heiligen Ort.
examples.english: The pilgrims visit the holy place.
